mapper.update: UPDATE demo SET name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, age = #{age,jdbcType=INTEGER}, salary = #{salary,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, birthDay = #{birthDay,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, LAST_MODIFIED_BY = #{lastModifiedBy, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LAST_MODIFIED_DATE = #{lastModifiedDate, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} WHERE ID = #{id, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
